brief: A simple class to use a String as a lookup for an int value.

methods.name: size()
methods.desc: Returns the number of key/value pairs

methods.name: clear()
methods.desc: Remove all entries from the data structure

methods.name: keyArray()
methods.desc: Return a copy of the internal keys array

methods.name: values()
methods.desc: Return the internal array being used to store the values

methods.name: valueArray()
methods.desc: Create a new array and copy each of the values into it

methods.name: get()
methods.desc: Return a value for the specified key

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Create a new key/value pair or change the value of one

methods.name: hasKey()
methods.desc: Check if a key is a part of the data structure

methods.name: increment()
methods.desc: Increase the value of a specific key value by 1

methods.name: sortKeysReverse()
methods.desc: Sort the keys alphabetically in reverse

methods.name: sortValues()
methods.desc: Sort by values in ascending order

methods.name: sortValuesReverse()
methods.desc: Sort by values in descending order

description:
A simple class to use a String as a lookup for an int value. String "keys" are 
 associated with integer values.
name: IntDict
